alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 01 at 2:49AM MST until March 01 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County, including Interstate 25 from 10 miles south of Chugwater to Wheatland. North Snowy Range Foothills including Interstate 80 between Laramie and Rawlins. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers, with a high risk for blow overs.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills
